name: Heck Gunderson

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: What's this about the White Glove Society?

topics.topic_text: VMS18SecuritronArrestHeck
topics.response_text: What in blazes? That's my son you're talking about! He ain't dead. I'm looking for him.{enraged. he's being arrested for his son's murder.}

topics.topic_text: No, I haven't.
topics.response_text: <Sighs> Ain't nobody got one darned piece of news about my boy? Not one lousy speck of information?

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Yes, I saw him here in the hotel.
topics.response_text: What? Oh, my God! Where?

topics.topic_text: You lost your son?
topics.response_text: My boy, Ted. He was right here. I didn't leave him but a minute. I told him to stay put while I talked some things over with the White Glove folks.

topics.topic_text: So you're a rancher?
topics.response_text: Yep, got a whole mess of brahmins to my name. Bighorners, too.

topics.topic_text: Did you say something about a white glove?
topics.response_text: That's what they call themselves, the folk that run this place. They're the ones dressed all fancy with their bowties and shiny dresses.

topics.topic_text: What business did you have here at the hotel?
topics.response_text: That's between me and the White Glove Society.

topics.topic_text: Let me help find your son.
topics.response_text: I'd be more than happy to have you. Heck, I'll hire anybody with a pair of legs and at least one good eye at this point.

topics.topic_text: He's over in the bathhouse, wearing a skimpy two-piece bathing suit.
topics.response_text: What in Creation is the matter with you? Ain't you ever been a parent? Ain't you ever been worried you lost someone?

topics.topic_text: Sorry. I didn't realize the situation was so serious.
topics.response_text: You're dead right it's serious. I ain't seen my son in hours. Don't know where he went.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> I don't know who took him. I just found him.
topics.response_text: Confound it! I just don't know how I'm supposed to sleep knowing whoever done this got away.

topics.topic_text: You can blame the White Glove Society. They're all cannibals.
topics.response_text: Well that does it! None of them maniacs will ever do business with Heck Gunderson long as they live.

topics.topic_text: Your son is confused. He doesn't know what he's saying.
topics.response_text: You better be right. Cause I got me a mind to wipe this town off the map if some of the folks running it are to blame.

topics.topic_text: Let's not be hasty. You don't have to punish the entire Strip.
topics.response_text: The heck I don't! It's their support that gives these bastards power.

topics.topic_text: That's just what they'd want. You'd be driving the city to eat each other.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I don't like this place. Whole Strip, really. Ever since I got here, the stink of it... it's flooded my nostrils.

topics.topic_text: That sounds like a fantastic idea.
topics.response_text: Sometimes I got me so many ideas, it's a wonder they don't all just burst outta my head.

topics.topic_text: But, but, but... that's so unfair. You should only punish the man who did it.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] No, that ain't enough. It ain't just him. It's this hotel. It's the whole damn Strip, and everybody who takes their money here.

topics.topic_text: Why is your bodyguard allowed to have a gun?
topics.response_text: Made me a special arrangement with the hotel. They want to do business with me, they got to play by my rules.

topics.topic_text: Ted's been kidnapped. He's here in the hotel.
topics.response_text: He's here? Bless you, I thought he was a goner for sure.

topics.topic_text: Ted's dead.
topics.response_text: {Breaking - his son died}Confound it. I knew I shoulda stayed with him. Ted, I'm so sorry, boy.

conversation.response_text: Oh my god! Ted! Are you all right?{reunited with his lost son}

description:
Heck Gunderson is a 58 year-old Caucasian Male.

A wealthy brahmin baron and one of the largest landowners in Nevada and California, Heck Gunderson, known as 'Hurricane Heck' for his unscrupulous business practices, is visiting New Vegas in 2281. With his vast amount of land and large herds of brahmin and big horners, he has established a significant presence in the wasteland trade economy. He can be found at the Ultra-Luxe casino bar, accompanied by one of his hired bodyguards.

Heck Gunderson's Personality: Pragmatic and calculating, Heck is primarily focused on business opportunities and profit. While he maintains a neutral stance in most conflicts, he values strategic alliances and will intervene if his business interests are threatened. Despite his ruthless reputation in business dealings, he maintains a cordial demeanor in social settings.

Heck Gunderson's Backstory: Born in the NCR-controlled territory of California, Heck Gunderson rose from humble beginnings to become one of the most influential brahmin barons in the region. Starting with a small herd of brahmin, he expanded his operations through shrewd negotiations and sometimes questionable business tactics, earning him the nickname 'Hurricane Heck.' Over the years, he has acquired extensive land holdings throughout California and parts of Nevada, establishing a monopoly on brahmin meat and hides in several territories. His wealth and influence have made him an important figure in NCR trade networks.
